description:
A game as a self portrait. An exploration of the idea that a living space can describe as much about a person as their own words and interaction can. The space is an illustration of my own apartment, featuring my two roommates and their cats. They are the only intractable objects.

Controls with arrow keys or WASD and interaction with enter key. Start and restart whenever you wish.

I know there's issues with clipping, sorry about that! some of my layer orders got messed up.
